data.text: @Jinniesobinnie Got it, Jinnie. We've sent you a DM, for us to ask for your details. Kindly check.
@Jinniesobinnie Hello, Jinnie! May we know if you're able to file a report for this?
@toots_cruz Hi, Toots. We're sorry to learn about your experience. We've sent you a DM for us to look into your concern further. Kindly check. Thank you!

@notyourjerl Hello, Jerl. We're sorry to hear about this. Please know that we do not mean to cause you any disservice with your experience with us. We've sent you a DM, for us to assist you further, kindly check.
@IlonggoGi A report was submitted to our team regarding the cabin temperature, Paulo. Kindly approach and request for assistance from any of our cabin crew. Thank you.
@IlonggoGi Our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience, Paulo.
@IlonggoGi Hello, Paulo. We are sorry to hear this. Kindly allow us to submit a report regarding this matter. You may approach our cabin crew for further assistance. Thank you.
@dyleinna78 Hi, Enna. We're sorry for the inconvenience. May we know if you're able to approach any of our airport staff for assistance?

@iamjcdeeel Hi, @iamjcdeeel. We are sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We assure you we would not disrupt a flight unless deemed necessary. May we know if you were issued a new flight schedule?
@kimiberr You're welcome!
@margaortigas Hi Marga. Our apologies for the inconvenience. We sent you a DM. Kindly check your inbox. Thank you.

@floydtena Got this, Floyd. We're able to retrieve your DM. As of the moment, we are awaiting feedback from the concerned office. We're truly sorry for the delay. We'll get back to you for news. Thank you.

@floydtena Hi Floyd. We regret to learn of your disappointments. Upon checking, we do not have an existing conversation. May we request to re-send us your concern or send us the screenshot of the said DM for our reference? Thank you.
@atisone Hello, Daveo. We apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. We have sent you a DM so we can assist you further. Thank you.
@longwood50 Hello, Tom. We are sorry to hear this. May we ask for your flight number so we can submit a report regarding this and share your feedback to our airport team? Thank you.
@shell_thata Hello, Sheleo. We are sorry to hear this. We have sent you a DM so we can assist you further. Thank you.
@ivy_joy We are sorry to hear this, Ivy. May we know which PAL e-mail address did you send your correspondence? Thank you.
@shell_thata Hi, Sheleo_j. Allow us to look into your concern further. May we know if you were able to file a report regarding your missing baggage? Thank you.

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @alib2547 @bilyonaryo_ph Hi, Pertmaster. We apologize for the inconvenience. May we know which PAL office are you in communication with regarding your baggage concern? May we kindly request you to adjust your account settings so we could reach out to you via DM. Thank you.

@mohammadfajrin Hi, Mohammad. This is noted. May we know if you have an existing booking with us?
@Lilybwheeler Hi Lilian. This is well noted. We have sent you a DM to further assist you on this.
@dodingGREY Hi, Percius. We have sent you a DM regarding this.
@3mulous We're truly sorry for this, Louise. We will continue communicating with you via DM.

@Lilybwheeler Hello, Liliana. We are sorry to hear about this. Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Thank you for understanding.
@precious_dayss Hello, Anne. We are sorry to hear about your reported experience. May we ask for your flight number so we can check on this further? Thank you.
@ExcitingPart14M We are sorry for this, Engineer. This means that your purchased ticket indicates USD150 as the cancellation charge. Thank you for understanding.

@ExcitingPart14M Hello, Engineer. Refunding your ticket will depend on the rules and restrictions of your booking. These conditions indicate if the ticket is refundable and shows the applicable charges. Refunding your ticket may be subject to fees, if any. Thank you for understanding.
@3mulous Hi, Louise. We are sorry to hear about this. We have sent you a DM. Hope you can check. Thank you.
@AstridDev9 We would like to kindly send you a DM so we can assist you further with your cargo concern, astdevereaux9. Thank you.

@asn5714 You're welcome, عبدالسلام.
@kimiberr We have sent you a DM to assist you with your refund concern, Kimber. Thank you.

@aahhmmiiee We have sent you a DM. Kindly check your inbox. Thank you.

urls.title: NO SHOW DOWNLINE CANCELLATION
urls.description: What is “No-Show Downline” Cancellation? Tickets should be used in sequence as stated in the Conditions of Carriage that governs the terms of your ticket. If you do not show up for a flight (your “Missed Flight”) that has connecting and/or returning flights, these onward or return flights will be automatically cancelled. As such, the “No-Show Downline” Cancellation is an automatic cancellation of your return or onward booking once the Missed Flight is tagged as “Non-User” or “No-Show” at the airport. How

urls.title: Manage Booking
urls.description: Change in travel plans due to COVID? We assure you that your current tickets are safe and remain valid. We have enhanced some of our polices to give you more flexibility due to the evolving COVID-19 situation, and uncertainties of travel. To view your options if your flight is affected by cancellations or travel bans click here. Enhance your flight experience and get the most out of your trip with add-ons and extras tailored to your travel
